title: Beautiful Luxurious Penthouse 2 Bed 2 Bath - East Boston
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 303288666', 'Rent: $3,400 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Rent Includes:: Water', 'Parking:: no parking', 'Beautifully designed 2 bed 2 bath penthouse unit in East Boston.', 'This is not your traditional rental, get ready to live a luxurious lifestyle!', 'Open concept living room and kitchen with a Juliet balcony.', 'Kitchen features Bosch stainless steel appliances, Grohe fixtures, Quartz countertops and an island with breakfast bar.', 'Common bathroom has a tub.', 'Master bedroom has an en suite bathroom.', 'Natural sunlight, and hardwood floors throughout.', 'Laundry/utility room with shelving in unit.', 'The entire apartment & roof deck is wired with Sonos surround sound system.', 'Street parking.', 'Features:', 'Gas Fireplace', 'Nest Thermostat', 'Central AC/Heating', 'Camera Intercom System', 'Private Roof Deck with Grill', 'Storage Room in Basement', 'Sonos Surround Sound System', 'Electronic Keyless Access System', 'Shelving/Drawer Systems in Closets', 'FEATURES', 'A/C', 'Breakfast Bar', 'Built-Ins', 'Central Air', 'City View(s)', 'Dishwasher', 'Disposal', 'Extra storage', 'Free Laundry', 'Gas Fireplace', 'Gas Range', 'Hardwood Floors', 'High Ceiling', 'Large Rooms', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Lots of Windows', 'Microwave', 'Natural Light', 'Open Floor Plan', 'Quartz Countertops', 'Roof Deck', 'Stainless Steel Appliance(s)', 'Storage', 'Pictures used in our marketing may occasionally be of model units.', 'Apartment availability, features and amenities subject to variation and change.', 'Contact posting agent for the most current and accurate information available.', '- Senné']
